Category.name: Profiles
Category.ExampleQuestion: How many profiles have been created in the last month?
What is the success rate of profile verification?
How much time does it typically take to verify a profile from creation to approval?

Category.name: Video Calls
Category.ExampleQuestion: What is the average duration of a video KYC call?
What percentage of calls are dropped before completion?
How often do audio or video quality issues impact the KYC process?
How many calls does each agent handle on average per day?

Category.name: Agent Actions
Category.ExampleQuestion: How many calls were made today ?
What is the P90 of call duration this week?

Category.name: Agent Performance
Category.ExampleQuestion: Which agent has made the most phone calls ?

Category.name: UTV Reasons
Category.ExampleQuestion: How frequently are profiles marked as UTV?

Are there any trends or patterns in UTV rates over time?

Category.name: Checker Action/Performance
Category.ExampleQuestion: How do approval and rejection rates compare between makers (agents) and checkers?
How many profiles are reviewed by checkers on a daily/weekly basis?
What are the common reasons for checkers rejecting profiles that were approved by agents?
What is the average time taken for the review process from start to finish?
